WorkItem.ClosedComment: Crit Caps and floors implemented with commit 45914
WorkItem.Description:
There is nothing in the code that stops the Crit% to get negative values. There may be modifiers along the road which are both negative and positive. But the final crit value should only be able to get the values 0-100%.
 
A negative crit value will actually "steal" damage from the normal damage made. (i.e. a negative number of shots are critical shots...?!?)
 
This is the same as for the current Elitist Jerks spreadsheet (v92b) but will be corrected in the next release.

Comments.Message: I'll be adding this functionality when I change the way Shots are called (will have a class that uses a CombatTable to enforce limits)
